content: अनुवाद्य {%<ab>pot. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} To be explained or illustrated. {@--2@} (In <ab>gram.</ab>) To be made the subject of an assertion (in a sentence), opposed to विधेय which affirms or denies something about the subject. In a sentence the अनुवाद्य or subject which is supposed to be already known is repeated to mark its connection with the विधेय or predicate and should be placed first; अनुवाद्यमनुक्त्वैव न विधेयमुदीरयेत्; in वृद्धिरादैच् आदैच् should have been placed first, though the construction is defended by Patañjali.
